subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson felt the wrath of Nascar fans on Twitter after he seemed to abandon his Hendrick teammate Dale Earnhardt Jr. at Daytona last week.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson felt the wrath of Nascar fans on Twitter after he seemed to abandon his Hendrick teammate Dale Earnhardt Jr. at Daytona last week.
